title: Beckman Coulter, Siemens Healthineers, Abbott, Others Gain 510(k) Clearances in March
summary: The US Food and Drug Administration granted clearances for testing instruments, a blood clot drug companion diagnostic test, and infectious disease tests, among other devices.

title: Agilent Gains IVDR Certification for Expanded Use of CDx Assay for Keytruda
summary: The PD-L1 IHC 22C3 PharmDx (Code SK006) assay is now certified for use to aid treatment decisions for patients with gastric or gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma.
